definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
"eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
incoming letter/letter from afar/same as 来信
Hangu Pass in modern day Henan Province, strategic pass forming the eastern gate of the Qin State during the Warring States Period (770-221 BC)
an informal letter sent by an organization
letter of congratulations/greeting card (e.g. for New Year)

sentences.english: Now, try to write an acceptance email of your own.
sentences.chinese: 現在，嘗試着寫一封你自己的接收函。

sentences.english: How to handle “the ratification of foreigners' travel to Tibet”?
sentences.chinese: 如何辦理“外國人入藏旅遊批准函”？

sentences.english: Received your E mail this morning thanking Mr. Hitching Wang for something he's done for you.
sentences.chinese: 今晨接到一封你寄給王志成先生的致謝函。

sentences.english: Foreign tourists how to travel in Tibet?
sentences.chinese: 外國人爲何需要辦理“入藏旅遊批准函”？

sentences.english: How can you bind a variadic member function to a functor?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼能與一個可變參數函數函？

sentences.english: I know, I read his letter of acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 我知道了，我看過他的接收函了。

sentences.english: The letter of guarantee should reach us two months before shipment is due, as stipulated in contract.
sentences.chinese: 擔保函必須在合同規定的裝運期前兩個月到達我方。

sentences.english: I never received a thank-you note for either.
sentences.chinese: 不過關於這兩份禮物，我從來沒有收到任何致謝函。

sentences.english: The university will send you a letter of acceptance.
Thereby, the advancement of duality theories is a big milestone in functional analysis.
sentences.chinese: 從而對偶理論的引入是泛函分析中的一次偉大轉折。

sentences.english: Thank you for your quotation for the refrigerators.
sentences.chinese: 感謝你方寄來的電冰箱報價函。

sentences.english: For a sales letter, this means driving your buyer to action.
sentences.chinese: 對於一封推銷函，這意味着驅使買方下手購買。

sentences.english: Some semiparametric techniques and functional data analysis.
sentences.chinese: 一些半參數技術和泛函數據分析。

sentences.english: These new Rules also incorporate provisions relating to counter-guarantees.
sentences.chinese: 本新規則還加入了有關反擔保函的規定。

sentences.english: Please also look for our new catalog via email, under separate cover for your review.
sentences.chinese: 此外，請您也看看隨件函附上的新產品介紹項目表。

sentences.english: Why foreigners need to handle "the ratification of travel to Tibet"?
sentences.chinese: 異國報酬何需要管理“入藏驢友覈准函”？

definition: incoming letter/letter from afar/same as 来信
an informal letter sent by an organization
to issue (a memorandum etc) to lower levels/to distribute (e.g. disaster relief to victims)
to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
to reply officially to a subordinate
